plugin.name: Footnotes
plugin.author: Habari Community
plugin.description: Use footnotes in your posts. Syntax: <footnote>Your footnote</footnote>, wherever you want the reference point to be. Everything is done automatically. You can also cite a source using a url attribute like this <footnote url="http://foo.bar/foo/">Title</footnote>. Also now supports ((WP-Footnotes syntax, for compatibility.)).
